alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 9:03PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 945 PM MST... At 903 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kings Ranch, or 8 miles east of Gold Canyon, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Apache Junction, Superior, East Mesa, Gold Canyon, Top Of The World, Gold Camp, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Usery Mountain Park, Superstition Springs Mall, Top-Of-The-World, Saguaro Lake, Canyon Lake, Superstition Mountains, Goldfield Ranch, Four Peaks, Kings Ranch, Apache Lake, and Salt River Tubing Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 186 and 206, and between mile markers 218 and 236. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 194 and 202. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 23 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Superior
